alert.note: Alert for Beauregard; Rapides; Vernon (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 22 at 9:14AM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Rapides, northeastern Beauregard and southeastern Vernon Parishes through 945 AM CDT... At 913 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Rosepine, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... De Ridder, Leesville, Rosepine, Hineston, Fort Polk, Pitkin, New Llano, Lacamp, Fullerton, Otis, Elmer, Leander, Sieper, Cravens, Calcasieu, Union Hill and Pickering. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 200 PM CDT for central, southwestern and west central Louisiana.
